titles.title: A bill to provide the Court of Claims with jurisdiction to hear, determine, and render judgment upon any claim for back pay by Beatrice Braude against the United States.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 10/6/1988--Introduced. Grants the United States Claims Court jurisdiction to hear, determine, and render judgment upon any claim for back pay by a named individual against the United States arising out of the termination of her employment at the United States Information Agency.
